item.description:
*FIRST EVENT FOR THE NEW YEAR!*

Come join us this Friday night at one of Boston's newest venues, Boston Rocks! Expect DJs to spin hip-hop all night in a lively atmosphere. A fun place to meet new people and to get your groove on! All members welcome, and feel free to bring a friend or two!

DETAILS: We will meet at 8:30pm in the bar area at the new Hard Rock Cafe (22-24 Clinton St, formerly known at The Rack), which is located right next to Faneuil Hall. We will head over to Boston Rocks! around 10:00pm to beat the lines. Please meet us at the Hard Rock (before 10pm), as you may not find us later. Cover: Expect to pay $10, but it might be less.

FIND THE ORGANIZER: My picture is located on the left-hand side of the site. For help/questions, my cell: 646.541.0708.

Please dress appropriately as this is an upscale venue. If traveling by T, Government Center is the closest T stop on the green line.

Hope to see you there! Charlie
item.how_to_find_us: My picture is on the site. Call my cell if you have questions or trouble finding the group.
item.why: Our meetup group is one of the largest in Boston because people have a great time meeting new people and enjoying the Boston Nightlife!

group.name: The Boston Night Life Meetup Group

item.name: Party Like a Rock Star in 2008 @ Boston Rocks! This Friday, Jan 18th!!
